yo i was walking on the block heard a couple shots caught one in the leg and i know who did it they gonna get it wrap up my leg bounced upstairs and got strapped up i love that drama shit im all gassed up i lit that kush up and got doughed up and thought about all the foul shit i did i cant help it i was this way since a kid then i slide out the crib hunt down my pray the look in my eyes like i sniffed some yay ran up on homes and blast away he passed away twin got the last laugh today anybody front i keep that on me you had to die homey thats part of the game i got guns put niggas dont know how to aim im in the shooting range mastering the art
